name: sequence
name of the alias that is used to play t: used to uniquely identify alias entries when more than one sound goes to an alias, used only to catch unwanted duplicates (default = 0)

name: file
name of the alias that is used to play t: the name of the file that contains the sound data (required)

name: vol_max
name of the alias that is used to play t: 0 is silent, 1 is full volume (default = same as vol_min)

name: pitch_min
name of the alias that is used to play t: 1 is normal playback, 2 is twice as fast, 0.5 is half as fast (default = 1)

name: pitch_max
name of the alias that is used to play t: 1 is normal playback, 2 is twice as fast, 0.5 is half as fast (default = same as pitch_min)

name: dist_min
name of the alias that is used to play t: within this distance in inches, the sound is always full volume (default = 120)

name: dist_max
name of the alias that is used to play t: outside this distance in inches, the sound is not started.  If left blank or set to 0, the sound will play from any distance.  This does not affect sound volume falloff.

name: channel
name of the alias that is used to play t: auto, menu, weapon, voice, item, body, local, music, announcer (default = auto)

name: probability
name of the alias that is used to play t: weight to use for the weighted probability of playing this sound instead of another sound (default = 1)

name: masterslave
name of the alias that is used to play t: if "master", this is a master sound.  If a number, then this sound won't exceed this volume whenever any master sound is playing.  If blank, then neither master nor slave.

name: loadspec
name of the alias that is used to play t: space-separated list of which maps should use this alias; eg, "burnville dawnville".  If blank, the alias is used on all maps.
